Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| ca. (approximately) |

Note: "PSC" stands for "Polymer Solar Cell" and is a type of material used in solar cells. Therefore, "PSC devices based on these polymers" can be considered a material property as it refers to the specific type of device made from the mentioned polymers.
